actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    Users.userId, 
    (SELECT Users.name FROM Users WHERE Users.userId = TimeUse.userId) AS n,
    SUM(stude) AS s, 
    SUM(exercise) AS e, 
    SUM(course) AS c 
FROM 
    TimeUse
JOIN 
    Users ON TimeUse.userId = Users.userId 
WHERE 
    Users.userId = {{appsmith.store.userId}}
GROUP BY 
    Users.userId
ORDER BY 
    Users.userId;
